se350.afifsohaili.gameframework

Class Grid<T extends Data<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • se350.afifsohaili.gameframework.Grid<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The data inside each grid represented by a class that implements the Data interface..

    public abstract class Grid<T extends Data<?>>
extends Object
    Stores data for each tiles.
    Author:
    Afif Sohaili

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected T[][] data
      The two-dimensional array that represents the grid data.
      protected int horizontalTiles
      The number of horizontal tiles and vertical tiles, as set in the option.
      protected int verticalTiles
      The number of horizontal tiles and vertical tiles, as set in the option.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid()
      Initialize the grid.

      Returns the data at the given row and column from the grid.
      protected abstract void init()
      User-defined initialization of the grid array.
      abstract boolean updateGrid(String... update)
      Update the grid based on user input.
      (package private) boolean validateGrid()
      Checks if the array that stores the data of the tiles is null.

        protected T extends Data<?>[][] data
        The two-dimensional array that represents the grid data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grid

        public Grid()
        Initialize the grid.

    • Method Detail

      • validateGrid

        boolean validateGrid()
        Checks if the array that stores the data of the tiles is null. If it is indeed null, then the grid is not valid. False is returned. Otherwise, true is returned.
        Returns:
        True if the grid is not null. Otherwise, false.

      • init

        protected abstract void init()
        User-defined initialization of the grid array.

      • getElementAtPosition

        public abstract T getElementAtPosition(int row,
                     int column)
        Returns the data at the given row and column from the grid.
        Parameters:
        row - row of the data
        column - column of the data
        Returns:
        the data at the given row and column from the grid.

      • updateGrid

        public abstract boolean updateGrid(String... update)
        Update the grid based on user input. Called by Mechanics class every time an input is accepted from the user.
        Parameters:
        update - updates based on user input. The string that is passed to this method depends on the implementation of input().
        Returns:
        true if there are changes to the grid data, false otherwise.
